description: [Pikabot Distribution February 2024](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0036) utilized obfuscated JavaScript files for initial [Pikabot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1145) payload download.(Citation: Elastic Pikabot 2024)

external_references.description: Daniel Stepanic & Salim Bitam. (2024, February 23). PIKABOT, I choose you!. Retrieved July 12, 2024.
